detail_desc: Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fully lined pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake pockets with decorative, gathered frills and elasticated hems. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.
Shorter-style bikers in stretch fabric with a high waist and lined gusset. Firm shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Polo shirt in a fine-knit viscose and nylon blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, short, rib-trimmed sleeves and ribbing at the hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a sewn-in skirt flap at the front that ties at one side. High waist and a zip at the back.

Padded jacket in cotton corduroy with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with decorative ears on top. Zip with a chin guard and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Diagonal fake front pockets and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece. Recycled polyester lining and filling.
Top in a semi-transparent weave with decorative fringing, V-neck and skinny shoulder straps. Lined at the top.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frills down the front that continue down the back, long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.

Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a wide flounce with laser-cut, scalloped edges. Small metal decoration on one shoulder strap. Matching bottoms with laser-cut, scalloped edges.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, fitted velour dress with collar and cuffs in a woven fabric embroidered with sparkly stones, an opening at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Lemon-shaped metal earrings. Length approx. 5 cm.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Purse with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small, zipped coin compartment. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sleeveless romper suit in slub cotton jersey with press-studs down the front, raw-edge patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with sparkly decorations at the top, a low waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative straps that cross at the back, and a string back.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft knit containing some glitter. An appliqué on the front, pompom on the top, knitted scalloped edges and ties at the sides. Fleece lining.
Knee socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit with triangle cups, removable inserts and ties at the top. Seam at the waist, a low-cut back and laser-cut scalloped trims.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slightly longer jacket in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist, jetted pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Knitted set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Ribbed trims around the sleeves and hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy denim made from a cotton blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves, narrow buttoned cuffs and a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft cotton and modal jersey with a deep neckline and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, short sleeves and a sewn-on bow at the front.

Relaxed-fit sweater vest in a soft rib knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the sweater vest is recycled.
Small bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 5x12.5x19 cm.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long, flared skirt in a double layer of softly draping, voluminous tulle. High waist with a grosgrain waistband and an elasticated section and concealed zip at the back. Lined with two layers of woven fabric.
Bikini briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a fold-down shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt in a cupro and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar, classic front and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. The shirt is made partly from recycled cupro.
Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, two buttons, a zip fly, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Set with face paints in white, black, red, green, yellow and light blue. 6x2.2 g. Not for children under 3 as the packaging contains small parts.
High-waisted jersey trousers with covered elastication at the waist and wide, flared hems.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke at the front and short butterfly sleeves.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 0.8 cm to 1.5 cm.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy, denim-look Tencel™ lyocell weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-on fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist. The bikers have a light sculpting effect on the tummy and thighs and push-up effect on the bum with the help of mesh reinforcements and rounded seams.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, V-neck dress in sturdy jersey with decorative lace details at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and A-line skirt. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey with reversible sequins on the front.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed stretch denim made from an organic cotton blend with a zip that goes halfway down the front.
Long, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a racer back, seam with concealed elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, sleeveless dress in patterned viscose jersey with narrow tie shoulder straps and narrow ties below the shoulders. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Pre-tied bow tie in velvet with an adjustable satin strap and fastening at the back. Width 11.5 cm.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
